meanings.definition: A device used to measure the rate of flow of a liquid or gas.
meanings.sent1: The flowmeters in the lab helped us track how fast the water was moving.
meanings.sent2: The technician installed new flowmeters to monitor the gas flow in the pipes.
meanings.sent3: The flowmeters at the factory were so accurate, they could even measure the speed of bubbles in soda.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like flowmeters, always calculating the movement of people around her.
meanings.sent5: The flowmeters hummed softly as they recorded the flow of air through the ventilation system.
